subject: Deafness
Football
lead_paragraph: The Washington Redskins were ordered to provide deaf and hard-of-hearing fans with “equal access to aural content” at FedEx Field, like music lyrics, ads and other broadcasts on the public-address broadcasts. United States District Court Judge Alexander Williams said that since the suit was filed, the Redskins had resolved the “vast majority of the issues” raised by the plaintiffs by captioning play-by-play, emergency information and other content.
